mapper.select: SELECT A.BOARD_NO, A.CUSTOMER_NO, A.BOARD_TP, A.BOARD_SUBJECT, A.CREATED_AT, A.BOARD_CONTENT, A.BOARD_POP_FG, FN_USER_NM(A.CREATED_NO) AS CREATED_NAME FROM T_BOARD A WHERE 1=1 AND A.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND A.DELETED_FG = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE T_BOARD SET BOARD_POP_FG = 'Y' , UPDATED_AT = NOW() WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
UPDATE T_BOARD SET DELETED_FG = 'Y' , DELETED_AT = NOW() WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
